keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: There has been a yearning in the collective mind of American soccer fans for a young superstar to carry that mantle, and Pulisic’s emergence has started those conversations anew.

headline.print_headline: Pleas for Patience as a Prodigy Rises
headline.main: Christian Pulisic Is the Greatest Thing Since ... What? Slow Down

snippet: There has been a yearning in the collective mind of American soccer fans for a young superstar to carry that mantle, and Pulisic’s emergence has started those conversations anew.
abstract: American soccer prodigy Christian Pulisic, who at age 17 plays for both top German club Borussia Dortmund and United States men's national team, works to maintain perspective under pressure of extreme expectations.
